title: Tamim Ahsan
text: I am a PhD Candidate at the School of Chemistry and Molecular Bioscience, University of Wollongong, New South Wales, Australia. I am currently exploring stress-induced molecular changes in the brains of psychiatric patients using a spatially resolved single-nucleus multimodal approach.
